{{short description|Great-grandfather of Bilbo Baggins}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Balbo Baggins | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Hobbiton]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1167}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{SR|1258}} | deathlocation= | age=91 | notablefor= | family=[[Baggins Family|Baggins]] | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Berylla Boffin]] | children=[[Mungo Baggins|Mungo]], [[Pansy Baggins|Pansy]], [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto]], [[Largo Baggins|Largo]], [[Lily Baggins|Lily]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Balbo Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]], and the first known member of the [[Baggins Family]]. ==History== Balbo was born when the Shire was recovering from both the [[Days of Dearth]] where [[Gandalf]] came to the aid of the Hobbits.{{App|B2|50}}, p. 1088 Balbo was the original patriarch of the [[Baggins Family]], being the first recorded member of the respected family of [[Hobbits]]. He married [[Berylla Boffin]] and their children were [[Mungo Baggins|Mungo]], [[Pansy Baggins|Pansy]], [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto]], [[Largo Baggins|Largo]] and [[Lily Baggins|Lily]].{{App|Baggins|50}}, p. 1100 Balbo was the great-grandfather of [[Bilbo Baggins]], the great-great-grandfather of [[Frodo Baggins]], and the great-great-great-grandfather of both [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Peregrin Took]].{{App|Took|50}}, p. 1103 ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | BAL |y| BER | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |BAL='''BALBO
